flawed_nl_solution:
If Darius scored 10 points, then Marius scored 10 + 3 = <<10+3=13>>13 points in total.
Darius scored 5 points less than Matt, so Matt scored 10 + 5 = <<10+5=51>>51 points in total.
So all three friends gathered 13 + 51 + 10 = <<13+51+10=74>>74 points.
#### 74

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
